about.name: Estu
about.desc: Estu aims to provide meaningful connections, events, financial tools, and brand collaborations that help college students achieve a balanced life.

projectTeam.desc: The team at Creative Script collaborated across various domains including mobile, web, backend, design, QA, and project management to deliver a seamless and engaging platform for Estu.

problem.desc: College students often juggle multiple apps and platforms to manage their academic, financial, and social needs. Estu addresses this challenge by providing an all-in-one solution that simplifies student life while enhancing engagement and functionality.

goals.title: User Goal
goals.desc: Deliver a seamless platform for college students to manage academic, financial, and social aspects of their lives.

goals.title: Business Goal
goals.desc: Ensure scalability and performance optimization while aligning with Estu’s brand vision to enhance user engagement and retention.

solution.desc: Creative Script provided a comprehensive solution including KYC onboarding, AI chatbot, payment features, Apple/Google Wallet integration, exclusive campaigns, and admin dashboards, ensuring seamless functionality across mobile and web platforms.

discoveryPhase.identification: Understanding the unique challenges faced by college students through client insights and market research.
discoveryPhase.validation: Client-driven insights coupled with extensive research on student needs and challenges.
discoveryPhase.analysis: Analyzed pain points and mapped out an integrated solution to address fragmented student life management.

problemsIdentified.title: Fragmented Student Tools
problemsIdentified.desc: Multiple apps and platforms complicate student life.

problemsIdentified.title: Unstructured Vision
problemsIdentified.desc: Initial client ideas required significant refinement and organization.

problemsIdentified.title: Integration Challenges
problemsIdentified.desc: Third-party dependencies like Visa and Mbanq added complexity.

ideaExploration.analogyUsed: Estu was envisioned as a unified ecosystem, simplifying and enriching student life management with innovative features.

behindTheScenes.naming: Estu represents 'students' in a minimalistic and memorable form, directly aligning with the platform’s purpose.

ui.approach: Delivered an intuitive and visually engaging design to ensure easy navigation and interaction for college students.
ui.socialProof: Built trust through high App Store and Google Play ratings and showcased testimonials and impactful features on the landing page.
ui.futureScope: Scaling the platform to add more advanced features, acquire the next 10,000 users, and explore international markets.

achievements: Delivered a comprehensive platform for college students, achieving high retention and user satisfaction.
Achieved a crash-free session rate of 99.5%, ensuring reliability.
Garnered an average app rating of 4.8 stars across platforms.
